item.description:
Haunted Harbor Happenings Halloween Cruise



Come learn about the haunted happenings of Salem Sound on this 1½-hour cruise by the shores of Salem, Marblehead, Beverly, Manchester and mysterious Misery Islands. Passengers will enjoy a fun-filled informative cruise loaded with spooky stories of ruthless local pirates, haunted lighthouses, mansions, abandoned mental wards, tails of local ghosts, ocean demons, and living monsters who reek havoc on local ships to this day! This cruise is an unbeatable way to see North Shore’s breathtaking autumn beauty while reveling some of its most mysterious secrets!
• 1½-hour cruise
• Departs Saturdays and Sundays at 1pm October 17th
• Adults $22
• Kids $12

Full Bar On All Cruises!
Grilled Burgers, Hotdogs and Chowda’ On All Cruises!
Reservations Required!
800.992.MAHI (6244) or 978.825.0001


This is a pay as you go event!

Meeting time: The boat leaves at 1:00, meetup time is 12:30 so we don't miss the boat.

This is one of their most popular cruises of the year! Call in your reservation so you don't miss the fun! Please update your RSVP "called in for my reservation" so we know that you will be coming aboard. You'll stay toasty warm! Heaters available aboard for all Fall Cruises, but make sure to dress appropriate (maybe we will be having Indian summer?). It only takes a minute to reserve spot/ticket: 800-992-MAHI (6244)

Where to meetup: The arcades will be on your right, The boat is at the very end at the pier.
Parking: You can park anywhere in front of the arcades. Be sure to check meters!!

This event is open to all!

Hope to see you there!
item.how_to_find_us: We will be at the begining of the pier!
item.name: Haunted Harbor Happenings Halloween Cruise
